subject: Judo
Martial Arts
Mixed Martial Arts
lead_paragraph: William C. Rhoden talks with Yoshihiro Uchida, judo coach at San Jose State for 66 years and of the first United States Olympic judo team, who has no plans to retire.
snippet: William C. Rhoden talks with Yoshihiro Uchida, judo coach at San Jose State for 66 years and of the first United States Olympic judo team, who has no plans to retire.
